tasks.title: Complete Q3 product roadmap
tasks.description: Finalize feature priorities, timeline, and resource allocation for Q3. Include stakeholder feedback and technical feasibility assessment.

tasks.title: Client onboarding call - TechStart Inc
tasks.description: Introduction meeting with new enterprise client. Present platform overview and discuss implementation timeline.

tasks.title: Review and approve expense reports
tasks.description: Process team expense submissions from last month. Verify receipts and approve for accounting.

tasks.title: Complete AWS Solutions Architect certification
tasks.description: Finish remaining practice exams and schedule certification test. Focus on database and security domains.

tasks.title: Weekly meal prep
tasks.description: Prepare healthy meals for the week. Focus on high-protein options and batch cooking grains.

tasks.title: Fix leaky kitchen faucet
tasks.description: Replace worn O-ring and check water pressure. May need to call plumber if issue persists.

tasks.title: Write blog post on productivity systems
tasks.description: Share insights about task batching and energy management. Target 1500-2000 words with practical examples.

tasks.title: Quarterly team performance reviews
tasks.description: Complete performance evaluations for 6 team members. Include goal setting for next quarter.

tasks.title: Database optimization research
tasks.description: Research query optimization techniques and indexing strategies for improved app performance.

tasks.title: Morning meditation practice
tasks.description: 15-minute guided meditation using Headspace app. Focus on breath awareness and stress reduction.

tasks.title: Client feedback analysis
tasks.description: Analyze survey responses from 23 clients. Identify common pain points and feature requests.

tasks.title: Update emergency contact information
tasks.description: Review and update emergency contacts for all family members. Include medical information.

tasks.title: Prototype mobile app navigation
tasks.description: Create interactive wireframes for mobile app navigation flow. Test with 3-5 users for feedback.

tasks.title: Schedule annual physical exam
tasks.description: Book appointment with Dr. Rodriguez for annual checkup. Request blood work and vision screening.

tasks.title: Prepare monthly financial report
tasks.description: Compile revenue, expenses, and profit metrics for board presentation. Include growth projections.

tasks.title: Learn Figma advanced features
tasks.description: Complete online course on component systems and design tokens. Practice with current project designs.

tasks.title: Plan anniversary dinner
tasks.description: Research restaurants and make reservation for wedding anniversary. Consider dietary restrictions.

tasks.title: Weekly client check-in calls
tasks.description: Conduct status calls with 4 key clients. Discuss project progress and address any concerns.

tasks.title: Photography portfolio update
tasks.description: Select and edit 20 best photos from recent shoots. Update website portfolio and social media.

tasks.title: Security audit preparation
tasks.description: Prepare documentation and access logs for quarterly security audit. Review compliance checklist.
